speak: I'm your COVID-19 ChatBot. I know many support resources you may find helpful.

items.text: Please go ahead and ask COVID-19 related questions. Currently only English is supported, but you may find the following resources in different languages helpful: [English](https://bellevuewa.gov/city-government/departments/city-managers-office/communications/emergencies/covid-19/community-resources); [Español](https://bellevuewa.gov/sites/default/files/media/pdf_document/2020/Covid-19-Spanish-4-8-20-comm-resources.pdf); [中文](https://bellevuewa.gov/sites/default/files/media/pdf_document/2020/Covid-19-Chinese-4-8-20-comm-resources.pdf); [한국어](https://bellevuewa.gov/sites/default/files/media/pdf_document/2020/Covid-19-Korean-4-8-20-comm-resources.pdf); [Pусский](https://bellevuewa.gov/sites/default/files/media/pdf_document/2020/Covid-19-Russian-4-8-20-comm-resources.pdf).
